heading: Exotic Andaman
tripHighlights: Cellular Jail and Light & Sound Show: Explore the historic jail and enjoy the captivating light and sound show.
Radhanagar Beach and Snorkeling: Relax on the pristine beach and snorkel at Elephant Beach.
Laxmanpur Beach Sunset: Witness a stunning sunset at Laxmanpur Beach with its unique rock formations.
Ross Island and North Bay: Visit historical ruins on Ross Island and enjoy water sports at North Bay Island.
inclusions: Accommodation on double sharing basis at above-mentioned hotels / similar in base category rooms.
Airport pick up and drop by a/c vehicle.
Makruzz / Green Ocean Cruise/ Nautika (base category) for Neil & Havelock as per the availability.
Assistance at all arrival and departure points
Entry permits | Entry tickets | Parking charges | Boat/ferry tickets wherever applicable.
exclusions: All kinds of personal expenses such as tips, laundry, telephone bills and beverages.
It does not include any meals unless and otherwise specifically mentioned.Guide
Optional, suggested or unspecified activities. Guide at Cellular jail will cost extra. Camera fee (still or movie)
Optional, suggested or unspecified activities. Guide at Cellular jail will cost extra. Camera fee (still or movie)
Any dispute regarding the child age to be settled directly with the hotels
knowBeforeYouGo: All Indian nationals are required to carry a valid Government ID proof.
All foreign nationals are requested to carry their passports with them during the tour
Any change in the itinerary is subject to the weather conditions, political manifestations and government restrictions. Company reserve the rights to rearrange the itinerary in such cases

reviews.name: Naman Rajput
reviews.review: The trip was the best... From the booking till the last day, the whole process was awesome... The operation spoc Kritik was super fab in all the coordination and arrangements... The best part was that he was available at all times... He was just a message away... The stay hotels, the travel arrangements, the food, the sight seeing was just breath taking... I didn't want to come back, it was all soo wonderful... I have already recommended thrillophilia to many of my friends and I am definitely going to book my international trips with thrillophilia...

itineraryDetails.heading: Arrival â€“ Port Blair
details: Arrival to port Blair airport, hotel drop by a/c vehicle then check in hotel & fresh up. After lunch, visit to local sightseeing visit cellular jail see light and sound show. After completion drop to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay at port Blair

itineraryDetails.heading: Port Blair â€“ ross island
details: Second day. have a Breakfast check out hotel Transfer from port Blair to ross island & north bay(own cost) . Arrival ross island have lunch . visit to north bay , check in hotel . dinner over night stay at port Blair.

itineraryDetails.heading: Port Blair - Swaraj Dweep (Havelock)
details: Have a relaxed breakfast. Check out the hotel and transfer from port blair to swaraj dweep (havelock). Arrival in Swaraj Dweep check-in hotel, after lunch going to Radhanagar beach & Kalapather beach. After completion, hotel drop by a/c vehicle. Dinner and over night stay at swaraj dweep (havelock)

itineraryDetails.heading: Swaraj Dweep (Havelock) â€“ Shaheed Dweep (Neil Island)
details: Have a great breakfast and check out hotel . Transfer from swaraj dweep (havelock) to shaheed dweep(Neil island). Arrival in Shaheed Dweep check in hotel and fresh up. Ready to visit bharatpur beach, laxmanpur beach & natural bridge. After completion evening check in hotel. Rest in rooms. Night dinner & overnight stay at shaheed dweep island.

itineraryDetails.heading: Shaheed Dweep (Neil Island) â€“ Port Blair (Shopping)
details: Have a great breakfast. Check -out hotel. Transfer from swaraj Dweep to port Blair. Arrival in Port Blair drop to hotel and check in. Rest rooms. At Evening, drop to shopping centre. After shopping check in hotel. Freshen-up and night dinner and overnight stay at port Blair.

itineraryDetails.heading: Port Blair-Airport Departure
details: Have a breakfast, morning check out hotel & Transfer to Port Blair .
